gpt-oss-120b.src: He calls her up every night.
I don't have any money at all.
This is what I can do for you.
I'd rather not go out today.
Sooner or later, we all are going to die.
Kwaku has next to nothing in his wallet.
What language do they speak in Switzerland?
I don't have time to be sick.
Her son's death broke Abena's heart.
She made friends with Asamoah at the party.
I've been sick for a very long time.
Kwame isn't happy about what's happened.
What kind of dreams do you have?
He came all the way from Nikko to see me off.
Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any.
How many friends do you have on Facebook?
I can't keep lying to Osei.
That is not what I want.
I just want to thank you for all of your help.
Can I go in there now?
He devoted his life to his study.
That bridge is made of stone.
I can't believe you’re doing this to me.
Kwabena was shocked by what Abena said.
He lived in Ankara for six years.
I can't get her out of my mind.
I do the laundry on Sundays.
Kwabena went along with the scheme.
My father works for a bank.
I am disappointed that my friends are not here.
I love you just as you are.
Kwabena is a very good friend.
Was this letter written by Abena?
I want to go to the movies today.
He was given an important mission.
Do you think I'm made of money?
Don't come near me. You're filthy.
She scolded him because he left the door open.
Asamoah didn't tell Abena his secret.
Asamoah is not serious about his studies.
Both of my parents aren't alive.
Would you care for more cookies?
She married him when she was 20.
We can pay 200 dollars at most.
Kwame left the house shortly after Abena left.
